Create a color palette from an image

create_palette_from_image.Rd

Create a color palette from an image

Usage

create_palette_from_image(
  img = NULL,
  n = 5,
  extract_method = "median",
  show = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

img

Image URL(s) and/or path(s).

n

Number of colors. Default is 5.

extract_method

Method of color extraction. Default is the median of the cluster specific RGB values. Other options are "mean", "mode", and "hex_freq" (most common hex colors per cluster)

show

Whether to show the generated color palette. Default is FALSE

...

Optional arguments in colorfindr::get_colors

Value

Vector of colors create_palette_from_image("https://free-images.com/lg/871f/garden_violet_blooms_profusely_0.jpg")
